description: The Vice Foreign Minister for North Korea, Han Song-Ryol, in an interview with the BBC said that if the U.S. pursues any military action, "it will provoke an immediate counter reaction."
maintext: The Vice Foreign Minister for North Korea, Han Song-Ryol, in an interview with the BBC said that if the U.S. pursues any military action, "it will provoke an immediate counter reaction."
title: North Korea 'will test missiles weekly,' senior official tells BBC
